K12D0436_H0785:367b-1: ku la lo ka n'a tha panytsa da sha ka n'a ma /
K12D0436_H0785:367b-3: rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba /
K12D0436_H0785:368a-0: dpal ldan rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po la phyag @368a *//
K12D0436_H0785:368a-2: de nas 'di ni mchog tu gsang //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-3: 'jig rten yang dag rmongs pa'i mchog /
K12D0436_H0785:368a-4: rigs dang rigs byung mngon brjod pas //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-5: gnyis mod sngags ni rab bshad bya //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-6: dam tshig spyod pa nges par grol //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-7: bya ba dus tshod rnam par spangs //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-8: de nyid gsum ldan yang dag lha //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-11: mthong dang ma mthong 'bras rab ster //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-12: de 'dir sngags ni mtshungs med pa //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-13: bla ma'i zhal la rnam par gnas //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-14: drag chen 'jigs byed lus la ni //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-15: lnga pa'i thig le dang bcas shing //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-16: rnam gcod dang po yang dag ldan //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-17: chen po lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-18: lce gnyis yan lag med gnyis gnas //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-19: lus gsum gyis ni sngags mchog la //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-20: yi ge rnams kyi bsdu ba las //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-21: mtshan nyid cho ga bzhin du bzlas //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-22: 'di yi rjes dran sngags pa yis //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-23: gtsang ngam yang na mi gtsang rung //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-24: lha bzhin mthong ba lha rnams kyis //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-25: de yi lha mo 'dod lha bzhin //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-27: bya ba med cing bsgrub pa'ang med //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-28: mchod med me la sbyin sreg med //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-29: rnal 'byor ldan dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-30: dus tshod rnams las rnam nges grol //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-31: rtse gcig sems ni g-yo mi byed //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-32: sgrib pa dang bral mtshungs pa yi //
K12D0436_H0785:368a-33: mchog gi bsam gtan yang dag sbyar //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-0: rigs kyi 'jig @368b rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa
K12D0436_H0785:368b-1: lnga bcu pa las sngags kyi de khon nyid kyi
K12D0436_H0785:368b-3: snying ga'i 'khor lo'i nang song ba'i //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-4: de nyid gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro /
K12D0436_H0785:368b-5: dbye ba nyis 'gyur de las ni //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-6: ye shes nyid ni kun 'gro bya //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-7: mi 'gyur dga' ba'i yul rig pa //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-8: sems kyi rjes su rtogs pa can //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-9: bya ba de yi bde 'dod phyir //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-11: de yi ngo bo rtogs nyid 'jug /
K12D0436_H0785:368b-12: de sems dga' ba'i spyod yul la //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-13: bya ba dang ni las rnams kun //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-14: tshig dang bcas pas the tshom med //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-15: bsam gtan rnal 'byor yang dag ldan //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-16: brtan par dgod bya blo ldan gyis //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-17: 'gro kun dgra yi rang bzhin gyi //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-18: sa steng sa 'og mtho ris sgrub //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-20: rnam gsum nam mkha'i nang song ba //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-21: padma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-22: nam mkha' phyag rgya'i bdag nyid bzhin //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-23: srog 'bab pa yi tshad kyis ni //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-24: gnas gnyis po yis goms par bya //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-25: de bzhin rab tu dgod byas nas //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-27: gang gis gzhan du bzlas byas dang //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-28: las rnams kyang ni bsgrub byas na //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-29: de ni mkha' la khu tshur bsnun //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-30: rmongs pas sbun stong 'joms par byed //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-31: bsam gtan sbyor bas cho ga bzhin //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-32: las gang rtag tu bya ba ste //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-33: de las myur du sgrub byed do //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-34: de yi las ni yid kyir 'dod //
K12D0436_H0785:368b-35: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lnga
K12D0436_H0785:369a-0: bcu pa las bdag gi de kho na nyid @369a
K12D0436_H0785:369a-2: rang bzhin bsam gtan dang bcas shing //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-3: dz'a ti mtshal gyi 'od zer bzhin //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-4: se 'bru le brgan me tog bzhin //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-5: li khri dmar po dang mtshungs gtso //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-6: sngags kyi sku yi lha yi lha //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-7: zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-8: mkha' pad zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-9: khyab bdag zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-10: mchog sbyin phyag gis yang dag rol //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-11: mu tig nor bus rnam par brgyan //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-12: padma'i phyag dang spyan gsum po //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-13: gzi brjid chen po sna tshogs sku //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-14: dpa' bo dbang phyug 'gro ba'i mgon //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-15: rnal 'byor ma yi thugs dgyes pa //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-16: dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-17: sngags rnams kun la bsam gtan bya //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-18: gang dang gang gis bsgom pa yis //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-19: rnal 'byor goms par gyur pa'i phyir //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-20: de ni de yi rang bzhin 'gyur //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-21: yid bzhin nor mchog ji bzhin no //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-22: lha ni dkar pos zhi rab ster //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-23: de bzhin dag ni rab sad byed //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-24: dbang dang dgug pa'i de nyid la //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-25: sku mdog dmar po rnam par bsam //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-26: du ba dmar ba'i 'od mdog can //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-27: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pas //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-28: dgra bo rnams ni nyer skrod pa //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-29: 'dir ni the tshom med par byed //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-30: du ba skya bo dmar ba yis //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-31: rnam bar zhe sdang nges sbyor ba //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-32: gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag /
K12D0436_H0785:369a-33: rengs pa la ni ser por shis //
K12D0436_H0785:369a-34: lug gi steng du gnas pa la //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-0: @369b rkan gyi bar du rnam phug na //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-1: srid pa gsum du gang gang gnas //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-2: thams cad rab tu rmongs par byed //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-3: gzhan dag rmongs pas ci zhig bya //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-4: don mang tshig ni rab 'dus ba //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-5: 'jig rten gsum gyi las rnams ni //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-6: yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa yi //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-7: rgyud gzhan rnams la nyer gyur pa //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-8: gsungs dang ma gsungs gyur pa ni //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-9: rang bzhin bsam gtan sbyor ba yis //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-10: bya ba 'di la the tshom med //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-11: gang zhig lha ni nam mkha' mtshungs //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-12: kha dog dbye bas so so ste //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-13: 'jig rten gsum na gang spyod pa'i //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-14: las rnams thams cad bya ba'o //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-15: skal bzang byed pa'i sngags rnams ni //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-16: snying ga'i chu skyes dbus song ba //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-17: snying ga'i chu skyes sbyor ba yis //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-18: dbang la sogs pa yang dag bsgrub //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-19: yi ge gsum dang bcas pa'i lha //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-20: steng du 'gro ba gsum ldan pas //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-21: mi rnams las ni rtag bsgrubs pa //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-22: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhal la gnas //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-23: rnam pa gsum ni 'gugs par byed //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-24: padma gzugs ldan gyur pas mdzes //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-25: rtag sbyor rgyun du rnal 'byor bas //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-26: mar me g-yo med gnas pa bzhin //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-27: sngon gsungs lha yi lha dbang phyug /
K12D0436_H0785:369b-28: skya rengs dmar po dang mtshungs 'od //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-29: mtshan mo phyed kyi dus gnas la //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-30: rnal 'byor nyid ni yang dag spyod //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-31: de yi gzugs 'dzin lus la ni //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-32: yang dag sngon du bkod pa yis //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-33: zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i lha //
K12D0436_H0785:369b-34: bsgrub bya'i lus la yang dag blang //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-0: @370a *// thams cad bla ma'i zhal la gnas //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-1: zhags pa lcags kyu'i 'od zer gyis //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-2: de las lcags kyu bsnun nas ni //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-3: zhags pa yis ni 'gugs par byed //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-4: rnam par myos shing lus ni dmar //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-5: yang dang yang du brgyal gyur te //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-6: bu ga sgo dgu nas bsnun nas //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-7: khrag gis rab tu 'bab par byed //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-8: sgrib pa med par dang mtshungs par //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-9: rang lus rnam par lta bar bya //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-10: de yi dbugs las bzhengs pa'i sngags //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-11: yi ge'i dbang po dang por bsam //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-13: kha yi sgo ru sngon 'dod rol //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-15: kha yi nang nas nges par 'byung //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-16: bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim gyur te //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-17: ji srid de snying chu skyes la //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-18: gang zhig de yi snying gnas pa //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-19: 'dir ni de'i snying kun nas phrogs //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-20: mer mer por ni blangs pa yis //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-21: sgrol ma'i gzugs bzhin yid 'phrog pa //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-22: de ni gsum pas cho ga bzhin //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-23: rlung gis lo ma g-yo ba ltar //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-24: rang gi khyim du rim par bsgom //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-25: gcig gi ngo bor gyur pa mchog /
K12D0436_H0785:370a-26: lha dang lha yi sgrub pa'i thabs //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-27: mtshan mo mdun du bsgrub par bya //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-29: 'tsho ba dang ni nor gyis kyang //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-30: sa stengs 'jig rten slar ci smos //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-32: sngags kyi dbang po sgrub pa pos //
K12D0436_H0785:370a-33: rang dbang med rnams sbyar mi bya //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-0: sngags kyi rgyal dbang bzlas byas @370b pas //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-1: rgyal srid sgrub pa de mchog go /
K12D0436_H0785:370b-2: gzhan du gang gis rab bsgrubs na //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-3: bud med 'dod pas long bzhin myos //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-4: gal te lha yi bu mo yang //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-5: de yi skad cig nyid la mchi //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-6: rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa las
K12D0436_H0785:370b-7: lha'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o
K12D0436_H0785:370b-8: //// 'jig rten dbang phyug snying po mchog /
K12D0436_H0785:370b-9: sba zhing srog bzhin yang dag bsrung //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-10: dam tshig spyod pa dman pas kyang //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-11: 'dren pa'i bdag nyid sngags bzlas bya //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-12: gcig pu grogs dang bral byas te //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-13: blo dang ldan pas 'bum du bzlas //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-17: sdud pa dang ni yang dang yang //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-19: dran pas 'di la the tshom med //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-20: sems dang sems med sbyor ba ni //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-21: sems ni sems med la nges mthong //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-22: sems ni sems ma la thim nas //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-23: rab 'jug lus skyes ma rnams la //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-24: nad bcas nad med pa dang ni //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-25: nad med de bzhin nad bcas byed //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-26: zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog /
K12D0436_H0785:370b-27: sngags kyi rgyal po'i dbang pos so //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-28: gzhan du byis pa rmongs pa yis //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-30: gang zhig rang bzhin sbyor bral bas //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-31: las rnams bsgrub pa de mchog min //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-32: gang gis gsum gsum gnas skabs gsum //
K12D0436_H0785:370b-33: 'jig rten mgon po nyid rig nas //
K12D0436_H0785:371a-3: zhes pa ni dpal padma 'bar ba'i rgyud chen po
K12D0436_H0785:371a-4: las byung ba rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po lnga
K12D0436_H0785:371a-6: pandi ta chen po bi ma la shr'i bha dra'i zhal snga nas /
K12D0436_H0785:371a-7: byang chub rin chen gyis bskul nas /
